channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta just bought Manus, an AI startup everyone has been talking about
item.description: Meta says it'll keep Manus running independently while weaving its agents into Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp, where Meta's own chatbot, Meta AI, i...

item.title: The Great Big Power Play
item.description: US support for nuclear energy is soaring. Meanwhile, coal plants are on their way out and electricity-sucking data centers are meeting huge pushback. ...

item.title: China Will Tax Contraceptives in a Bid to Improve Birth Rates
item.description: Amid historically low birth rates and economic pressures from its aging population, China will eliminate a decades-old tax exemption on contraceptives...

item.title: Tips for Keeping a Digital Diary and Why You Should
item.description: After 10 years of journaling, my only regret is not starting sooner.

item.title: Plaud Note Pro is an excellent AI-powered recorder that I carry everywhere
item.description: Plaud Note Pro is a $179 notetaker, which is an excellent recording device first

item.title: 2025 was the year AI got a vibe check
item.description: AI’s early-2025 spending spree featured massive raises and trillion-dollar infrastructure promises. By year’s end, hype gave way to a vibe check, with...

item.title: The Best Vacuum for Pet Hair—We Tested Many to Find Which Ones Work Best (2026)
item.description: Cordless, handheld, robot, and traditional—we tested them all to find the vacuum that’s fantastic for fur.

item.title: Social media follower counts have never mattered less, creator economy execs say
item.description: “I think that 2025 was the year where the algorithm completely took over, so followings stopped mattering entirely,” LTK CEO Amber Venz Box said.

item.title: How to make your startup stand out in a crowded market, according to investors
item.description: Investors on what they really want to hear in a founder's pitch.

item.title: iMP Tech Mini Arcade Pro Review: A Nintendo Switch Arcade Cabinet
item.description: A fun diversion for retro gaming on the Nintendo Switch 2—if you can stand to look at it.
